channel.title: Midi keyboard in auxy
channel.description:
Been working on my music with auxy for a lot of years, everything would be eassier for me and i think for a lot of people if we can use in our productions a midi controller. Please make it possible soon, that would be a big step for the app.
Thank you ;)

item.title: Midi keyboard in auxy
item.dc:creator: Db909
item.description:
Been asking for live recording for years, whether it be via a built in keyboard/pad type thing or external midi controller (including midi sending apps). Was always told it would require a huge amount of work to make that possible. Hope that work is being done!

Read full topic

item.title: Midi keyboard in auxy
item.dc:creator: Pheonix
item.description:
Yo I totally agree with that and also I think this should go in the most wanted features topic!

Read full topic
